teaser: First up, Brian Barrett, Editor in Chief at Gizmodo, talks about the Moto 360 and the future of Motorola Mobility under Lenovo. And Maryanne Wolf, author of "Proust and the Squid: The Story and Science of the Reading Brain," stops by to talk about how different mediums rewire our brains to read in different ways.
description: First up, Brian Barrett, Editor in Chief at Gizmodo, talks about the Moto 360 and the future of Motorola Mobility under Lenovo. And Maryanne Wolf, author of "Proust and the Squid: The Story and Science of the Reading Brain," stops by to talk about how different mediums rewire our brains to read in different ways.
title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, September 4, 2014
